name: Arancia International
overview:
Arancia Industrial S.A. de CV, along with its subsidiaries, operates in the food and enzyme, special textile rental, food service, and transportation and logistics businesses. It also invests in biotechnology, agriculture, and logistics businesses. The company offers textile rental services to hospitals. Arancia Industrial S.A. de CV is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.

Manufacturing: Holding company with interests in the manufacture of food preparations, food additives and flavourings, manufacture of enzymes, hospital laundry, food storage and distribution,

offices.address1: Lopez Cotilla 2032, Colonia Los Arcos Vallarta

relationships.title: Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
Vice President of the board and Executive President

funding_round.source_description: Enzymotec Successfully Completes New Investment Round of $11 Mln; to Close Additional $7 Mln Line of Credit
